// {{{ NX.Date.getDayOfYear

/**
 * @class NX.Date
 */

/**
 * @method getDayOfYear
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(date) {

    var num = 0,
        d = NX.Date.clone(date),
        m = date.getMonth(),
        i;

    for(i = 0, d.setDate(1), d.setMonth(0); i < m; d.setMonth(++i)) {
        num += NX.Date.getDaysInMonth(d);
    }

    return num + date.getDate() - 1;
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
